item.title: Changes related to GDPR
item.author: mightyBroccoli (nico)
item.description:
General Data Protection Regulation ( GDPR )

The day has finally come. The new GDPR has become reality. I am writing this post to clear up the situation for every user using my server/ services.

changes due to GDPR

Due to the enforced changes with the GDPR I did rework the whole process logging of all programs which come in contact with users.

prior to the GDPR

  • logging
    • log lifetime of 14 days
    • logs get archived after 14 days to allow me to react to error/ warning messages
    • logfiles/ archives are automatically deleted if older then 14 days

after the GDPR changes

  • logging
    • log lifetime of 7 days
    • logs get archived after 7 days to allow me to react to error/ warning messages
    • logfiles/ archives are automatically deleted if older then 7 days
